#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int N;

int main(){

    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--){

        scanf("%d", &N);
        int arr[N+1];
        for(int i=1; i<=N;i++){
            scanf("%d", &arr[i]);
        }
        long long ans = 0;
        int inc=2;
        while(inc<=N){
            long long temp = 0;
            for(int i = inc;i<=N;i+=inc){
                temp+=arr[i];
            }
            ans=max(ans, temp);
            inc++;
        }
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }

    return 0;
}
